entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • IDE Error: Specified argument was out of the range of valid values. #77012
  • error while overriding an abstract generic method with type constraint and with nullable return class #77655
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35918.02 #77653
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35918.19 #77652

Updated

  • 'Target Project' drop-down list is always empty in Launch Profiles > Roslyn Component #77582
  • Completion still suggests items that do not satisfy generic constraint #76986
    Backlog
  • Binary Log Support in Roslyn #76740
    .NET 10
  • MSBuildWorkspace.OpenProjectAsync fails when dotnet is not pre-installed in the system #77640
  • Test plan for "null-conditional assignment" #75554
    .NET 10
  • [EE] Switch to newer version of IDkmClrExpressionCompiler.CompileExpression API and report error when module reading fails #76887
  • Unnecessary cast added to the `default` arm in the `IDE0066` fixer #77084
  • Exception in `CSharpInlineMethodRefactoringProvider` when multiple fields are declared in a field declaration #76656
  • Suppress warning for generated code #41171
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Support textDocument/semanticTokens/full #77665
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Refresh `features/extensions` branch with latest bits from `main` #77663
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode
  • Add feature to convert classic extension methods to the new 'extension' form in C# 14. #77660
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: Adjust accessibility and file-type checks for extension members #77657
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Move MiscellaneousFilesWorkspace to a background thread. #77654
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix updating committed solution with insignificant changes #77648
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support ILogger.BeginScope() for LSP logging #77647
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'main-vs-deps' => 'release/dev18.0' #77664
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77662
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure we get telemetry signal for `Implement with Copilot` Code Fix #77643
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Generate Documentation - Bug Fixes #77641
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix generation of attribute with array constant #77661
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main-vs-deps' => 'release/dev18.0' #77659
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Extensions: flesh out behavior for some pattern-based binding scenarios #77608
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Fix watch window completion window upon manual completion invocation #77656
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Make ISemanticSearchCopilotUIProvider import lazy to avoid loading VS.EA.Copilot #77516
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77658
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Change vs deps flow #77651
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • On-the-fly-docs Pass along additional context #77510
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Another small set of package initialization optimizations #77646
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main-vs-deps' => 'release/dev18.0' #77650
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77666
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update maintenance-packages dependencies #77267
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Upgrade to VSSDK.BuildTools 17.14.1043-preview2 #77580
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete target types that do not use `[CollectionBuilder]` #77477
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Extensions: update semantic model APIs #77619
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Add LSP handler for custom requests #77444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Allow modification of source generated documents #77587
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Change keys for import caching #77627
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add RuntimeAsyncMethodGenerationAttribute #77543
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Runtime Async
  • Merge RoslynAnalyzers into Roslyn #77617
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • [TEST] Enable buildcheck #76756
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid reusing temps whose refs might be captured #76009
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Ref Fields
